00029 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00030 #include "ht32.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board.h"
00032 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00033 
00034 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00035   * @{
00036   */
00037 
00038 /** @addtogroup AES_Examples AES
00039   * @{
00040   */
00041 
00042 /** @addtogroup ECB
00043   * @{
00044   */
00045 
00046 
00047 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00048 #define BUFF_SIZE             (96)
00049 
00050 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 __ALIGN4 uc8 gu8KeyTable[] =
00052 {
00053   0x01, 0x23, 0x45, 0x67, 0x89, 0xAB, 0xCD, 0xEF,
00054   0x01, 0x23, 0x45, 0x67, 0x89, 0xAB, 0xCD, 0xEF
00055 };
00056 
00057 __ALIGN4 uc8 u8OrgData[BUFF_SIZE] =
00058 {
00059   0x00, 0x01, 0x02, 0x03, 0x04, 0x05, 0x06, 0x07,
00060   0x08, 0x09, 0x0A, 0x0B, 0x0C, 0x0D, 0x0E, 0x0F,
00061   0x10, 0x11, 0x12, 0x13, 0x14, 0x15, 0x16, 0x17,
00062   0x18, 0x19, 0x1A, 0x1B, 0x1C, 0x1D, 0x1E, 0x1F,
00063   0x20, 0x21, 0x22, 0x23, 0x24, 0x25, 0x26, 0x27,
00064   0x28, 0x29, 0x2A, 0x2B, 0x2C, 0x2D, 0x2E, 0x2F,
00065   0x30, 0x31, 0x32, 0x33, 0x34, 0x35, 0x36, 0x37,
00066   0x38, 0x39, 0x3A, 0x3B, 0x3C, 0x3D, 0x3E, 0x3F,
00067   0x40, 0x41, 0x42, 0x43, 0x44, 0x45, 0x46, 0x47,
00068   0x48, 0x49, 0x4A, 0x4B, 0x4C, 0x4D, 0x4E, 0x4F,
00069   0x50, 0x51, 0x52, 0x53, 0x54, 0x55, 0x56, 0x57,
00070   0x58, 0x59, 0x5A, 0x5B, 0x5C, 0x5D, 0x5E, 0x5F
00071 };
00072 
00073 __ALIGN4 u8 u8PlainText[BUFF_SIZE];
00074 __ALIGN4 u8 u8CipherText[BUFF_SIZE];
00075 
00076 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00077 void CKCU_Configuration(void);
00078 void AES_Test(void);
00079 void AES_Result(void);
00080 
00081 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00082 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00083   * @brief  Main program.
00084   * @retval None
00085   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00086 int main(void)
00087 {
00088   AES_InitTypeDef AES_InitStruct = { 0 };
00089 
00090   RETARGET_Configuration();               /* Retarget Related configuration                                 */
00091 
00092   CKCU_Configuration();                   /* System Related configuration                                   */
00093 
00094   BFTM_EnaCmd(HT_BFTM0, ENABLE);
00095 
00096   AES_ECB_Init(HT_AES, &AES_InitStruct);  /* AES ECB Init                                                   */
00097 
00098   /* Set key table, AES supports key size of 128, 192 and 256 bits.                                         */
00099   AES_SetKeyTable(HT_AES, (u32*)gu8KeyTable, sizeof(gu8KeyTable));
00100   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00101      The 256-bit AES key length may not support on some HT32 models, please check the datasheet for detailed.
00102   */
00103 
00104   /* Count AES encryption / decryption time from time zero.                                                 */
00105   BFTM_SetCounter(HT_BFTM0, 0);
00106 
00107   /* AES encryption / decryption test.                                                                      */
00108   AES_Test();
00109 
00110   /* Display Result                                                                                         */
00111   AES_Result();
00112 
00113   while (1);                           /* Infinite loop                                                     */
00114 }
00115 
00116 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00117   * @brief  AES encryption / decryption test.
00118   * @retval None
00119   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00120 void AES_Test(void)
00121 {
00122   /* Encryption                                                                                             */
00123   if (!AES_ECB_CryptData(HT_AES, AES_DIR_ENCRYPT, BUFF_SIZE, (u32*)u8OrgData, (u32*)u8CipherText))
00124   {
00125     /* Input length must be a multiple of 16                                                                */
00126      printf("ENCRYPT Error\r\n");
00127   }
00128 
00129   /* Decryption                                                                                             */
00130   if (!AES_ECB_CryptData(HT_AES, AES_DIR_DECRYPT, BUFF_SIZE, (u32*)u8CipherText, (u32*)u8PlainText))
00131   {
00132     /* Input length must be a multiple of 16                                                                */
00133     printf("DECRYPT Error\r\n");
00134   }
00135 }
00136 
00137 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00138   * @brief  Show AES result.
00139   * @retval None
00140   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00141 void AES_Result(void)
00142 {
00143   int i;
00144   int TestTime = BFTM_GetCounter(HT_BFTM0)/(SystemCoreClock/1000000);
00145   printf("index   OrgData   Ciphertext   Plaintext \r\n");
00146   printf("--------------------------------------\r\n");
00147   for (i = 0; i < BUFF_SIZE; i++)
00148   {
00149     printf("%03d     |0x%02X     |0x%02X        |0x%02X\r\n", i + 1, u8OrgData[i], u8CipherText[i], u8PlainText[i]);
00150   }
00151   printf("\r\n");
00152   printf("--------------------------------------\r\n");
00153   printf("Encryption/Decryption time = %d us\r\n", TestTime);
00154 }
00155 
00156 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00157   * @brief  Configure the system clocks.
00158   * @retval None
00159   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00160 void CKCU_Configuration(void)
00161 {
00162 #if 1
00163   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00164   CKCUClock.Bit.AES        = 1;
00165   CKCUClock.Bit.BFTM0      = 1;
00166   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00167 #endif
00168 }
00169 
00170 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00171 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00172   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00173   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00174   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00175   * @retval None
00176   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00177 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00178 {
00179   /*
00180      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00181      Debug message can be added here.
00182      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00183   */
00184 
00185   while (1)
00186   {
00187   }
00188 }
00189 #endif
